overview: The veteran warrior of the Supermegaforce Erwin Braddog sneaks through a forest in Vietnam to surprise his nemesis James Lee while eating bananas. The henchman doesn't take this lying down and throws his magic cape around his neck. A bloody fight, including the use of a corkscrew, is unleashed on that sunny day in 2007...
title: Erwin Braddock - Missing on Action 4
